text: Hastein (his name is also recorded as Anstign, Haesten, Hæsten, Hæstenn, Hæsting and Alsting) was a Viking chieftain. He lived in the late 9th century. He is famous for his attacks on cities in England, Spain, France, and Italy. ==References== Category:Danish people Category:9th-century births Category:9th-century deaths
title: Hastein
